On  0, "tobemligado <jasbell@...>" <jasbell@...> wrote:
> Can someone explain a coding situation where a Mock object can not be 
> used to solve a test case

  When you want to make Integration test :). I.e. when your intent is to verify
  that developed classes and other resources (such as DB or servlet container) 
  work together as expected.

  Best Regards,
  KIR
